EIX 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Interactions Plot

plot.interactionsTable.Rd

Interactions Plot

# S3 method for interactionsTable
plot(x, ...)

Arguments

x

a result of `interactionsTable` function
...

other parameters

Value

a ggplot object

Details

NOTE: High gain of pair for option="pairs" can be a result of high gain of down variable (child). As strong interactions should be considered only these pairs of variables, where variable on the bottom (child) has higher gain than variable on the top (parent).

Examples

#' library("EIX")
library("Matrix")
library("data.table")
library("xgboost")

dt_HR <- data.table(HR_data)
sm <- sparse.model.matrix(left ~ . - 1,  data = dt_HR)

param <- list(objective = "binary:logistic", base_score = 0.5, max_depth = 2)
xgb.model <- xgboost( param = param, data = sm, label = dt_HR[, left] == 1, nrounds = 50, verbose = FALSE)

inter <- interactionsTable(xgb.model, sm,               option = "interactions")
inter
#>       sumGain               Parent                Child
#>  1: 745.59421      last_evaluation average_montly_hours
#>  2: 708.87232      last_evaluation   satisfaction_level
#>  3: 634.99841      last_evaluation   time_spend_company
#>  4: 559.99847   satisfaction_level   time_spend_company
#>  5: 390.18979      last_evaluation       number_project
#>  6: 318.01422 average_montly_hours   time_spend_company
#>  7: 312.10888 average_montly_hours      last_evaluation
#>  8: 174.18144 average_montly_hours       number_project
#>  9: 169.90201 average_montly_hours   satisfaction_level
#> 10: 168.38994   satisfaction_level average_montly_hours
#> 11: 131.79431   satisfaction_level      last_evaluation
#> 12: 112.06531   time_spend_company      last_evaluation
#> 13:  87.09534   satisfaction_level       number_project
#> 14:  39.78418   time_spend_company       number_project
#> 15:  19.02950       number_project      last_evaluation
#> 16:  14.38998            salarylow         salarymedium
plot(inter)

inter <- interactionsTable(xgb.model, sm,               option = "pairs")
inter
#>         sumGain               Parent                Child

#>  2: 3421.167360   satisfaction_level   time_spend_company
